10-24-2024: - Active no longer grants 14 spirit power or reloads
- Active now grants +3 Movespeed for 5 seconds after returning
- Active now grants +40% Spirit Resist for 5 seconds after returning
10-11-2024: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ethereal Shift|Size=20} Ethereal Shift scaling with duration
10-10-2024: - Can no longer end it early
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball no longer triggers on hit effect while in Ethereal Shift
09-19-2024: - Fixed being able to shoot while using {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ethereal Shift|Size=20} Ethereal Shift and flying with Vindicta
08-15-2024: - No longer provides +10% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate
07-18-2024: - Fixed a bug that could prevent you from shooting when you came out
06-27-2024: - Post-cast bonus is now still granted when ending the buff early
06-13-2024: - Shifting Shroud: Renamed to {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ethereal Shift|Size=20} Ethereal Shift
